description: Monthly-varying sea ice concentrations from years 111 to 140 of the pre-industrial control (piControl) experiment.
name: PIControlSICMonthlyVar
rationale: To provide sea ice concentration (SIC) boundary conditions for the CFMIP sstPi experiment.
longName: Monthly-varying sea ice concentrations from the pre-industrial control simulation
keywords: sea ice concentration, piControl, pre-industrial control, SIC, monthly-varying
